data.comment: The big names in today's match at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 1, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe.
In the minute 5, Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Getafe throw-in in Granada's half.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 7, Granada to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Free kick Granada.
Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 9, Jesus Gil Manzano awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jaime Mata (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Getafe will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Granada.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Getafe, Getafe push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Getafe.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Granada in the half of Getafe.
Granada are caught offside.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Getafe have a goal kick.
Angel Montoro (Granada) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
In the minute 22, Free kick in a good position for Granada!
Mathias Olivera for Getafe has been booked by Jesus Gil Manzano and receives a first yellow card.
Granada drives forward and Robert Kenedy gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
In the minute 27, Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Getafe close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Important block from the Granada defence as Marc Cucurella fires in a strike for Getafe.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Granada's area.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Granada.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Granada.
In the minute 32, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe just outside Granada's area.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Getafe drive upfield and Mathias Olivera gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Granada defender.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Getafe.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
Throw-in for Granada at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 37, Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Getafe throw-in in Granada's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
In the minute 39, Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
German Sanchez is booked for the away team.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Granada.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Granada.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Granada have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 44, Robert Kenedy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Granada.
Granada have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Granada have been awarded a penalty in Getafe...
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Getafe.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Granada close to the penalty box.
Jesus Gil Manzano blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Djene (Getafe) has received a yellow card from Jesus Gil Manzano.
Angel Montoro converts the penalty to give Granada a 0-1 lead.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Granada.
In the minute 46, Angel Rodriguez is replacing Jaime Mata for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Getafe pushes forward through Cucho Hernandez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Getafe push upfield but Jesus Gil Manzano quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Getafe.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 52, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Getafe throw-in in Granada's half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
In the minute 53, Granada needs to be cautious. Getafe have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Granada.
Getafe have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Diego Martinez (Granada) is making a first substitution, with Antonio Puertas replacing Luis Suarez.
Darwin Machis is on a sub for Robert Kenedy for Granada.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Getafe in Getafe.
Throw-in Granada.
In the minute 57, Free kick Getafe.
In Getafe, Angel Rodriguez of Getafe is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Granada's half?
The match at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez has been interrupted briefly for a check on Djene, who is down injured.
The home team replace Nemanja Maksimovic with David Timor.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced Allan Nyom with Enes Ünal. This is the third substitution made today by Pepe Bordalas.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Granada.
Getafe attack but Angel Rodriguez's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Djene is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 74, Diego Martinez is making the team's third substitution at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez with Nehuen Perez replacing Angel Montoro.
Granada make their fourth substitution with Alberto Soro replacing Jorge Molina.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Granada.
Free kick Granada.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 79, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Getafe throw-in in Granada's half.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Granada needs to be cautious. Getafe have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 83, Getafe are whistled for offside.
Can Getafe capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Enes Ünal (Getafe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jesus Gil Manzano waits before resuming play because Dimitri Foulquier for Granada is still down.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Getafe.
Getafe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 89, Granada's Dimitri Foulquier is back in action after a slight knock.
Getafe are coming forward and Mauro Arambarri gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Granada have a goal kick.
Getafe's Enes Ünal has been booked in Getafe.
Throw-in Granada.
Jesus Gil Manzano will wait an extra 7 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Granada.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Throw-in Getafe.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Granada.
Granada are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Yangel Herrera (Granada) has received a first yellow card.
